desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: When Yuuka dropped by Schale's office to hand in a report, she learned of Sensei's disorganized and carefree lifestyle. In response, Yuuka scolds Sensei and organizes the receipts in the office.

desc.zh_tw: 優香来到夏萊的办公室转交报告时，亲眼目睹老师毫无节制的生活习惯。優香一边替老师整理发票一边碎碎念。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香来到夏莱的办公室转交报告时，亲眼目睹老师毫无节制的生活习惯。优香一边替老师整理发票一边碎碎念。

desc.en: Yuuka got in touch with Sensei and said that she would like to count the weapon usage in the previous battle to generate a financial report. Sensei said that he didn't know how to fill a said report and Yuuka promised that she would assist Sensei the next time she dropped by Schale.

desc.zh_tw: 優香联系上了老师，表示要清算一下在上次战斗中消耗的武器数量，以便报告财务情况。老师表示自己不会填财务报告，優香表示下次拜访夏萊时会协助老师。

desc.en: Yuuka visited Schale while Sensei was having lunch, and so she started looking over Sensei's bills. Soon, Yuuka noticed Sensei's account balance was quite unusual and found that Sensei had multiple large purchases. And for this reason Yuuka started checking all the bills and invoices.

desc.zh_tw: 優香来到夏萊，正好遇到老师吃饭，便开始帮助老师处理账单。很快，優香注意到老师的账户余额很有问题，并发现老师进行了多笔大额消费，于是开始检查老师的全部账单和发票记录。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: After that, Yuuka said in order to let Sensei have a more responsible spending habit, she required Sensei that Sensei should talk with her in advance before spending more than 5000 JPY on any items. Then, Yuuka left after scolding.
desc.jp: After that, Yuuka said in order to let Sensei have a more responsible spending habit, she required Sensei that Sensei should talk with her in advance before spending more than 5000 JPY on any items. Then, Yuuka left after scolding.
desc.thai: After that, Yuuka said in order to let Sensei have a more responsible spending habit, she required Sensei that Sensei should talk with her in advance before spending more than 5000 JPY on any items. Then, Yuuka left after scolding.
desc.ko: After that, Yuuka said in order to let Sensei have a more responsible spending habit, she required Sensei that Sensei should talk with her in advance before spending more than 5000 JPY on any items. Then, Yuuka left after scolding.
desc.zh_tw: 之后，優香为了表示为了让老师更有计划地花费，于是要求老师每次购买超过5000日元以上的东西时，都要和她商量一遍。之后，優香唠叨几句后就离开了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 之后，优香为了表示为了让老师更有计划地花费，于是要求老师每次购买超过5000日元以上的东西时，都要和她商量一遍。之后，优香唠叨几句后就离开了。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.

In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直譯為 阿羅娜)是蔚藍檔案中的“什錦之箱”中的系統管理員，設定上是一個輔助老師的個人小助理。彩奈的整體色調是藍色，與遊戲名稱“蔚藍檔案”相呼應。儘管長得很可愛，彩奈在幫助老師招募學生時卻經常會不出三星，具體是故意還是不小心的就不得人知了。從某種層面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄託著出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。

desc.en: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.jp: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.

desc.zh_tw: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的對策委員會学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。

desc.en: From what the Hoshino and Ayane said, Sensei acknowledged the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knew that sandstorms kept occurring in recent years, and no efforts were achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school put into it. As no banks were willing to lend them money, they were forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only went worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students had left the school.

desc.zh_tw: 从星野和綾音口中，老师获知了阿拜多斯欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知阿拜多斯地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。

desc.en: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.

desc.zh_tw: 顺利从头盔团手中救出茜香的老师和對策委員會学生们。战斗后，綾音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 顺利从头盔团手中救出芹香的老师和对策委员会学生们。战斗后，绫音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。

desc.en: Though successfully rescued Serika, she still fell apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Shiroko brought Serika to the infirmary. Ayane found the Helmet Gang seemed to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a mastermind in the dark.

desc.zh_tw: 虽然救出了茜香，但吃了一发防空导弹的茜香还是支棱不住。白子将茜香送到了医护室。綾音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.zh_tw: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,對策委員會学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和對策委員會学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是歌赫娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。

desc.en: On the way to school, Sensei met Ayane. Ayane said she was going to prepare for the debt payment at school and had found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It was then that Mutsuki appeared. Mutsuki invited Sensei to pay a visit on them, but was scolded by Ayane before leaving.

desc.zh_tw: 老师在路上遇到了綾音，綾音表示要回学校准备还款，并且已经查清了便利屋68的资料。这时無月突然出现，邀请老师带便利屋68看看，被綾音呵斥候离开。

desc.en: Ayane found out all the information of Problem Solver 68, stressing that they were seen as problem children in Gehenna, and therefore they should be handled with extra caution. On the other hand, Ayane thought that if they need to find the origin of the illegal weapons, they might have to visit the Black Market.

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.

desc.zh_tw: 抵达黑市的對策委員會一行人遇上三一综合学园的学生，日步美。日步美是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。對策委員會一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。

desc.en: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.

desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會一行人要求日步美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与日步美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长亞瑠，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.en: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.

desc.zh_tw: 巡视黑市的對策委員會一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。

desc.en: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.jp: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的對策委員會学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在對策委員會一行人身后。亞瑠对對策委員會学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。

desc.en: After waiting hours long for the loan interview, Aru eventually was rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos broke in.
desc.jp: After waiting hours long for the loan interview, Aru eventually was rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos broke in.
desc.thai: After waiting hours long for the loan interview, Aru eventually was rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos broke in.

desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠用向對策委員會成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亞瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亞瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki couldn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru said it was because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.

desc.en: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遙香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。

desc.en: Shiroko seemed to be questioning Hoshino seriously, but Hoshino pretended to know nothing. Nonomi and Sensei broke into the room, yet none of them mentioned anything - only "something with Hoshino". Nonomi said there's nothing should be hid between the Task Force, and Hoshino was forced to admit that it was only "Shiroko scolding her for sleeping too much". Despite that, Nonomi sensed dishonest in it.

desc.zh_tw: 白子似乎在对星野进行着严肃的质问，但星野一问三不知。野乃美和老师闻声赶到，但两人之字不提，只是表示“与星野有些事而已”。野乃美表示對策委員會间可没有什么好隐藏的，星野于是不得不表示“只是自己睡午觉太多而被白子骂了”而已。尽管如此，野乃美还是看出了其中的不真诚。

desc.en: Serika and Ayane obtained a map of land ownership throughout Abydos and confirmed an emergency. Initially, most of them, including Hoshino, thought that Abydos was obviously owned by the school; yet based on the transaction records, the most of the land had long been owned by the Kaiser Group.

desc.zh_tw: 茜香和綾音拿到了阿拜多斯全境的土地所有权地图，表示确认了一个紧急情况。起初，包括星野在内的大多数人都认为阿拜多斯当然由学校所有，但从交易记录上来看，显然大多数土地早已由凯撒集团所有。

desc.en: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部学生为了取得能让愛麗絲使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程師部>。愛麗絲在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程師部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千禧年学园的<工程部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程师部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程师部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。

desc.en: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.jp: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.

desc.ko: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程師部。工程師部的部长詠葉见状，便害怕起愛麗絲卓越的身体素质。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程部。工程部的部长歌原见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程师部。工程师部的部长咏叶见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程部。工程部的部长歌原见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。

desc.en: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was then introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also shot a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Department, that they could take it away if they won them.

desc.zh_tw: 詠葉等工程師部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。響主动提出要为愛麗絲找武器，但愛麗絲很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亞都梨主动为愛麗絲介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程師部众人本以为愛麗絲无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程師部决定测试遊戲開發部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌原等工程部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。柯托莉主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 咏叶等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亚都梨主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 歌原等工程部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。琴里主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。

desc.en: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.

Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<貝里塔斯>咨询。真紀回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<真理社>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.jp: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.

desc.zh_tw: 貝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真紀通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。

desc.en: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.

Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.

desc.zh_tw: 真紀认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，貝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。

desc.en: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and wanted Sensei to ask the Engineering Department to join them as well.

desc.en: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.jp: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.thai: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.ko: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.zh_tw: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往夏萊社团室。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往沙勒社团室。

desc.en: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.

Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.

desc.zh_tw: 在招待室里，来自千年的優香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏萊；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.

Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直譯為 阿羅娜)是蔚藍檔案中的“什錦之箱”中的系統管理員，設定上是一個輔助老師的個人小助理。彩奈的整體色調是藍色，與遊戲名稱“蔚藍檔案”相呼應。儘管長得很可愛，彩奈在幫助老師招募學生時卻經常會不出三星，具體是故意還是不小心的就不得人知了。從某種層面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄託著出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
